title: Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre
subtitle: Venue: Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre
description:
Situated at the intersection of Melbourne’s academic, cultural and technology precincts,  Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre affords delegates, exhibitors and visitors convenient access to Australia’s most cosmopolitan city.

  Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre is more than a landmark venue. Melbourne Convention & Exhibition Centre functions as an incubator for ideas, a champion of change and an advocate for community.
